title: Sinusoidal Modeling - phase shift and period

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses theta close parentheses equals cos open parentheses 2 theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The sinusoidal function <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a phase shift of the function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> by <math alttext="negative pi over 3"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> units. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: ​Consecutive minima of <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> occur at <math alttext="open parentheses negative fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction comma h open parentheses negative fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses pi over 6 comma h open parentheses pi over 6 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> because consecutive minima of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> occur at <math alttext="open parentheses negative pi over 2 comma g open parentheses negative pi over 2 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses pi over 2 comma g open parentheses pi over 2 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the image of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> with a horizontal shift of <math alttext="pi over 3"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> units left.

​​Consecutive minima of <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> occur at
